meanings.definition: A monetary unit equal to one hundredth of a Lithuanian or Malagasy lita.
meanings.sent1: I found a centas on the ground while walking to the store.
meanings.sent2: In Lithuania, you can buy small items with a centas.
meanings.sent3: The centas rolled away, making the children laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a centas, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The shiny centas sparkled in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Lithuania and Madagascar, equal to one hundredth of a lita.
meanings.sent1: Grandma gave me a centas to spend at the market.
meanings.sent2: Shops in Madagascar accept centas for small purchases.
meanings.sent3: The centas in my pocket jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: His words were like centas, valuable and treasured.
meanings.sent5: The centas slipped through his fingers, disappearing into the drain.
